item.title: How to run client without cmd?Please help
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

I want to make it so when i hit run.bat the cmd doesn’t stay up. i can’t figure out how. i tried alot.

@echo off
Title Client
cd ./Class/
java client 30 0 highmem members 32
exit

Help please

Read full topic
item.source: How to run client without cmd?Please help
